channel.title: 317 vps help
channel.description: i got a vps from vpsland and i downloaded no-ip but when i open it it says error connecting to server it says that where its trying to detect the ip. some1 help!!

item.title: 317 vps help
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:6, topic:447593”][quote author=snaper link=topic=550492.msg4034744#msg4034744 date=1341094909]
dude i have run my server on my own comp and got 10 players now when i go to set up vps no-ip says error connecting to server.
can some1 please tell me how to set up no-ip for a vps
[/quote]
Does your Vps have internet connection? And your no-ip? or your client?[/quote]
How would he connect to the vps if the vps didn’t have connection to the internet o.o?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 vps help
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

Make sure port is open in firewall(s), else contact your VPS provider.

Read full topic
